snippet: The fire broke out in Dukezong in Yunnan Province, which has cast itself as an inspiration for the mythic Shangri-la.
abstract: Fire breaks out in Dukezong, ancient Tibetan neighborhood in Yunnan Province of China that is said to be inspiration for mythic Shangri-La, destroying hundreds of wooden homes and shops.
lead_paragraph: The fire broke out in Dukezong in Yunnan Province, which has cast itself as an inspiration for the mythic Shangri-la.

headline.main: Fire Ravages China District Said to Inspire Shangri-La
headline.print_headline: Fire Ravages China District Said to Inspire Shangri-La
